alert.note: Alert for Boone; De Kalb; DuPage; Kane; Lee; McHenry; Ogle; Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 9:31AM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, hazardous travel conditions, and strong northwesterly wind gusts expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches are expected with the highest amounts east of Interstate 39. Northwesterly wind gusts of 45 mph are expected this evening. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Illinois. * WHEN...Until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain may mix with snow, especially close to the Interstate 88 corridor, before changing back to snow this evening. The strongest northwesterly winds are expected after sunset tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Boone; De Kalb; DuPage; Kane; Lee; McHenry; Ogle; Winnebago
